subject: Baseball
Doping (Sports)
Arbitration, Conciliation and Mediation
lead_paragraph: Fans will be hearing a lot more about Fredric R. Horowitz, the arbitrator who will hear the appeals of players seeking to have their performance-enhancing drug suspensions overturned.
snippet: Fans will be hearing a lot more about Fredric R. Horowitz, the arbitrator who will hear the appeals of players seeking to have their performance-enhancing drug suspensions overturned.
